modName: White and Black Daedric weapons and armor retex
summary: A retex of the daedric battle axe, war axe, hammer, mace, sword, greatsword and dagger, bow, arrows and armors. see for you self and tell what you think
descriptionHtml:
A retex of the daedric battle axe, war axe, hammer, mace, sword, greatsword and dagger, see for you self and tell what you think, this is my second time retexturing, so please, tell what needs to be better, and if you dont like also tell. if you whant another color or another weapon just tell.
Updated, now with armors, bow and arrows, it take some time to do, so if you like endorse, if you dont like, tell why.
there are mods that change the glow collor, they are will work with this mod so go see if you like
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3682 (armor and weapons, by cancrena) and
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3868 (only weapons, by Ashengrace)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3722 (only armor by Ashengrace)

Dont forget to check my other mods!
Swallow in Skyrim
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23763

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19534

Assassins creed style mage robe
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7755
